name: Slow-Cooker Choco-Peanut Clusters

ingredients.name: package
ingredients.original_string: 1  package (16 oz) vanilla-flavored candy coating (almond bark)

ingredients.name: package
ingredients.original_string: 1  package (16 oz) chocolate-flavored candy coating (almond bark)

instructions: In 4-quart or larger slow cooker, place candy coatings. Cover; heat on Low heat setting 2 to 3 hours, stirring occasionally, until completely melted.
Pour peanuts over melted candy mixture, and stir until coated. Drop by tablespoonsful onto cooking parchment or waxed paper. Allow to set completely, approximately 45 minutes to 1 hour.
